head.title: Download YouTube Videos in Original Quality — Avenor Downloader
head.description: Download YouTube videos locally on your PC. Choose quality, clip In/Out, keep privacy. Windows + macOS desktop app.

hero.title: Download YouTube Videos in Original Quality
hero.subtitle: Download locally on your PC. Choose quality, clip In/Out, keep privacy.

whatIs.title: What is Avenor YouTube Downloader
whatIs.p1: Avenor YouTube Downloader is a desktop application for Windows and macOS that lets you download YouTube videos directly to your computer.
whatIs.p2: Unlike online services, everything happens locally on your PC — no uploads to external servers, no privacy risks, and no quality loss.

benefits.title: Why download YouTube videos with Avenor

original.title: Original Quality
original.desc: Download videos in their original quality when available — up to 4K, 1080p, or whatever the creator uploaded.

clip.title: Clip Before Download
clip.desc: Set precise In/Out points and download only the fragment you need. Perfect for clips, highlights, or specific segments.

nolimits.title: No Ads, No Limits
nolimits.desc: Clean interface without annoying ads. Download as many videos as you want, no artificial restrictions.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.desc: Download as MP4 video or extract audio as MP3. Choose what works best for your needs.

clip.title: Clip YouTube videos before download
clip.p1: Found the perfect moment in a 2-hour podcast? Need just a highlight from a gaming stream?
clip.p2: Avenor's clip feature lets you set precise In/Out points before downloading.
clip.p3: No need to download the entire video and then trim it — save time and storage by downloading only what you need.

qf.title: Quality & formats
qf.p1: Always the original quality when available — exactly as on YouTube.
qf.p2: Pick the format that fits your workflow and devices.

s1.title: Copy YouTube URL
s1.desc: Copy the link to any YouTube video you want to download.

s2.title: Paste in Avenor
s2.desc: Open Avenor Downloader and paste the URL. The app analyzes the video and shows available qualities.

s3.title: Choose Quality & Clip (Optional)
s3.desc: Pick the quality you want and, if needed, set In/Out timestamps before downloading.

privacy.title: Privacy & safety
privacy.p1: Avenor works locally on your computer — we don’t upload your videos to external servers.
privacy.p2: Downloads are saved directly to your chosen folder.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why can’t I just use an online YouTube downloader?
faq.a1: Online tools often recompress video, add ads, limit length, and can be risky for privacy. Avenor is a desktop app: downloads run locally on your computer, without uploading your content.
faq.q2: Will I lose video quality after downloading?
faq.a2: No. Avenor downloads the best available YouTube quality when it exists (up to 1080p/1440p/4K/8K). No recompression happens unless you choose to convert.
faq.q3: Can I download only part of a YouTube video?
faq.a3: Yes. Set In/Out timestamps and download only the fragment you need, instead of downloading the full video and trimming later.
faq.q4: Why does Premiere Pro import my 4K/8K video without audio (VP9 / AV1 error)?
faq.a4: High-resolution YouTube downloads are often delivered in VP9 or AV1. These codecs can be partially unsupported in some editing workflows, which may cause missing audio or codec errors. Convert the file to MP4 (H.264) in Avenor’s Convert tab, then import again.
faq.q5: Does Avenor store my videos on a server?
faq.a5: No. Avenor doesn’t upload or store your files. Downloads are saved directly to your computer.
faq.a6: You can try Avenor for free. Some advanced features (higher resolutions, clipping, extra formats) may require a Pro plan.

head.title: Download Instagram Reels & Videos to Your PC — Avenor Downloader
head.description: Download Instagram Reels, Stories and videos to your PC. Save the best available quality, clip highlights with In/Out, export MP4 or MP3 — locally on Windows + macOS.

hero.title: Download Instagram Reels & Instagram Videos to Your PC
hero.subtitle: Save Reels, Stories and posts in the best available quality. Clip highlights before download and keep everything local — no browser download sites.

whatIs.title: What is Avenor Instagram Downloader
whatIs.p1: Avenor is a desktop app for Windows and macOS that downloads Instagram videos to your computer — great for archiving, editing, and offline use.
whatIs.p2: Instead of using random web downloaders, Avenor processes everything locally on your PC. Your links and downloads aren’t routed through third-party sites.

benefits.title: Why download Instagram videos with Avenor

original.title: Best Available Quality
original.desc: Save the best quality available for the original Reel, Story, or post — so it looks clean in your archive and edits.

clip.title: Clip the Exact Moment
clip.desc: Set In/Out timestamps before downloading to grab only the highlight you need — perfect for compilations and quick edits.

nolimits.title: No Browser Download Sites
nolimits.desc: Skip ad-heavy web tools and popups. Avenor is a desktop workflow: stable, fast, and processed on your computer.

formats.title: MP4 Video + MP3 Audio
formats.desc: Download as MP4 for devices and editors, or extract audio as MP3 when you only need the sound.

clip.title: Download only the exact segment — no filler
clip.p1: Need one line from a Story? A single reaction from a Reel? Or just the best 5 seconds for a montage?
clip.p2: Use In/Out timestamps to select the exact segment before you download.
clip.p3: That means smaller files, faster downloads, and a cleaner content library for your projects.

qf.title: Quality & formats
qf.p1: Save Instagram content in the best available quality for the original post when possible.
list: Best available resolution for Reels, Stories, and video posts
qf.p2: Choose the format — MP4 for editing and sharing, or MP3 when you only need the audio.

s1.title: Copy an Instagram link
s1.desc: Copy the URL of the Reel, Story, or video post you want to save.

s2.title: Paste it into Avenor
s2.desc: Open Avenor Downloader and paste the link. The app analyzes the content locally.

s3.title: Choose quality and optionally clip In/Out
s3.desc: Pick the best available quality and set In/Out timestamps if you want only a fragment.

s4.title: Download to your folder
s4.desc: Click download — the file is saved directly to your computer.

privacy.title: Privacy & safety
privacy.p1: Avenor is a desktop app — your downloads are processed on your computer, not on a random website.
list: No popups, browser extensions, or ad pages
You control where files are saved
privacy.p2: Downloads are stored in your chosen folder so you can keep an organized archive.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I download Instagram Reels to my PC?
faq.a1: Yes — when a Reel is accessible via a link, Avenor can download it to your computer in the best available quality.
faq.a2: If a Story is accessible via a link, you can save it. You can also clip the exact moment with In/Out timestamps.
faq.q3: Will this reduce quality or add a watermark?
faq.a3: Avenor aims to save the best available quality for the original post. It doesn’t add extra watermarks. Quality depends on the source that Instagram provides.
faq.q4: Is this an online Instagram downloader?
faq.a4: No. Avenor is a desktop app — it avoids ad-heavy web downloaders and processes downloads locally on your PC.
faq.a5: MP4 for video downloads, or MP3 if you only need audio (when extraction is available for the source).
faq.q6: Does Avenor store my links or videos?
faq.a6: No. Files are saved locally to your computer. Avenor does not upload or store your downloads on external servers.

head.title: Download TikTok Videos to Your PC — HD & No Quality Loss
head.description: Download TikTok videos locally on your PC. Save vertical short-form content in the best available quality, clip highlights, and extract MP3. Windows + macOS.

hero.title: Download TikTok Videos to Your PC — HD & No Quality Loss
hero.subtitle: Save TikTok videos locally in original quality. Clip highlights, extract audio, and reuse content for editing — all processed on your computer.

whatIs.title: What is Avenor TikTok Downloader
whatIs.p1: Avenor is a desktop TikTok downloader for Windows and macOS. It lets you save vertical short-form videos directly to your computer in the best available quality.
whatIs.p2: Perfect for creators, editors, and anyone who wants to reuse TikTok clips in compilations, presentations, or offline projects. Everything is processed locally — no ads, no popups, and no remote servers.

benefits.title: Why download TikTok videos with Avenor

original.title: Best Available Quality
original.desc: Download TikTok videos in the highest resolution available — optimized for vertical 9:16 format.

clip.title: Clip Highlights Before Download
clip.desc: Trim viral moments or save only the part you need before downloading — perfect for edits and mashups.

nolimits.title: No Ads, Local
nolimits.desc: Everything runs on your computer — no browser tools, no unstable websites, no random ads.

formats.title: MP4 / MP3
formats.desc: Save TikTok videos as MP4 or extract trending sounds as MP3 for offline use.

clip.title: Clip TikTok videos before download
clip.p1: Want to keep just one viral moment?
clip.p2: Set precise In/Out timestamps before downloading the video.
clip.p3: Ideal for short edits, reaction videos, and social media compilations.

qf.title: Quality & formats
qf.p1: Always the best available quality for the original TikTok.
qf.p2: Videos are saved exactly as provided by TikTok — without recompression or quality degradation. Choose the format that matches your devices and workflow.

s1.title: Copy the TikTok video link
s1.desc: Copy the URL of the TikTok video you want to download.

s2.title: Paste it into Avenor
s2.desc: Open Avenor Downloader and paste the link. The app analyzes the video.

s3.desc: Pick the quality you need and, if necessary, set In/Out to save only a fragment.

s4.desc: Click download and the video is saved locally on your PC.

privacy.title: Privacy & safety
privacy.p1: Avenor works entirely on your computer — we don’t upload your content.
privacy.p2: Downloads are saved directly to your chosen folder.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I download TikTok videos without losing quality?
faq.a1: Yes. Avenor saves the video in the best available resolution provided by TikTok.
faq.q2: Can I use downloaded TikTok videos for editing?
faq.a2: Yes. You can import downloaded videos into editing software or reuse clips in your projects.
faq.q3: Are TikTok videos downloaded in vertical format?
faq.a3: Yes. Videos keep their original aspect ratio (9:16) as published on TikTok.
faq.q4: Can I extract audio as MP3?
faq.a4: Yes. You can save the video as MP4 or extract audio separately as MP3.
faq.q5: Is this an online TikTok downloader?
faq.a5: No. Avenor is a desktop application — everything runs locally on your PC for better privacy and stability.
faq.q6: Does it work on Windows and macOS?
faq.a6: Yes. Avenor supports both Windows and macOS.
